text: Aamir Liaquat Hussain (; 5 July 1971 â€“ 9 June 2022) was a Pakistani politician, columnist and television host. He was a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan from August 2018 to October 2021, when he resigned from the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf. He was an assembly member before form 2002 until 2007. He also was the Minister of State for Religious Affairs from 2004 until 2007. Hussain was born in Karachi, Pakistan. Hussain died on 9 June 2022 at a hospital in Karachi, one month before his 51st birthday. A few hours before, he had a heart attack at his home. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Politicians from Karachi Category:Writers from Karachi Category:Television presenters Category:Columnists
title: Aamir Liaquat Hussain
